name: interior-schedule-app

scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy update" && git push origin production-stable:main
scripts.deploy:quick: git add . && git commit -m "Quick update" && git push origin production-stable:main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Build and deploy" && git push origin production-stable:main && railway up
scripts.build: echo 'Frontend already built in public/ folder - skipping'
scripts.build:full: cd interior-management-system/frontend && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../.. && cp -r interior-management-system/frontend/dist/* public/
scripts.railway:deploy: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to Railway" && git push && railway up
scripts.auto-deploy: cd interior-management-system/frontend && npm run build && cd ../.. && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Path 'interior-management-system/frontend/dist/*' -Destination 'public/' -Recurse -Force" && git add . && git commit -m "Auto deploy: Frontend build" && git push

description: 인테리어 회사를 위한 공사일정 관리 시스템
